title: Lass Of Ballintra, The
tune: g/f/e|d2 Bd efge|dBGB AGEG|d2 Bd efgb|afdf g2 g/f/e||d2 Bd efge|dBGB AGEG|d2 Bd efgb|afdf g2 d/e/f|||g2 gf gbag|fdad bdad|g2 gf gbag|fdef g2 d/e/f|g2 gf gbag|fdad bdad|edeg fdfb|afdf g2 g/f/e||.|defd cFAc|dfeg fdcA||And I like to occasionally roll the first f of the B part. So instead of |fcfa gdga| you get |~f3a gdga| (and you could roll the g there too).
